title: Photograph, "Album: Bennets Silver Polish"
description:
The present black and white photograph displays a round jar with a screw-on lid. The lid design features three small spirals placed at the center as if marking the points of a triangle; between the spirals, Bennetts, etched horizontally, radiates three times to the rim. A label affixed to the jar is imprinted Silver/ Bennetts/ Polish, with silver and polish in the designer's hand-lettered style type, in silver on black, and Bennetts in smaller stencil-style type in black on silver; spiral designs flank silver and polish on the left and right. Two lines of instructions regarding use of the product are imprinted in small sans-serif capitals in black on silver on the bottom row of the label. 

The silver-and-black color scheme has been confirmed by an actual label present in the Gustav Jensen inventory.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "Album: Bennets Silver Polish". 9.7 x 9.7 cm (3 7/8 x 3 7/8 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-84-s.
